fix-title-h1: Your Trusted Partner for Premium Produce Export
fix-title-p: Quality and freshness guaranteed in every shipment, from our farms to your global destination.
why-us-p-1: We implement rigorous post-harvest procedures and optimized cooling to lock in maximum flavor and guarantee an extended shelf life.
why-us-p-2: Our extensive network of contracted farms guarantees uninterrupted availability for high-volume orders and specific grade requirements.
why-us-p-3: Our dedicated team is available around the clock. We ensure meticulous preparation of all export documents for fast customs clearance.
process-step-1-p: Produce is harvested at optimal ripeness, then initially sorted to remove damaged or non-conforming items.
process-step-2-p: Products are cleaned, treated for shelf-life extension, and packed into certified export packaging with quality marks.
process-step-3-p: Products are pre-cooled immediately after packing to remove field heat and transferred to cold storage to maintain the cold chain.
process-step-4-p: Consignments are loaded into Reefers; all customs documents are processed, ensuring fast, efficient fresh arrival globally.

about-page-fix-title-h1: Years of Expertise Connecting Farms to Global Markets
about-page-fix-title-p: We are committed to delivering premium quality produce under strict international standards.
about-page-section-about-p: Al-Najah: Your Trusted Bridge for Produce Export We are a company strictly specializing in Agricultural Export, combining deep expertise in handling fresh produce with a commitment to global quality standards. Our vision is to connect our local farms with the most demanding global markets, ensuring your produce arrives with maximum freshness and efficiency.
about-page-section-global-p: Al-Nagah Company takes pride in exporting the finest Egyptian vegetables to markets across Europe and the Middle East, ensuring freshness and quality from farm to table.
about-page-section-journey-p-1: We started with a mission to blend agriculture and technology.
about-page-section-journey-p-2: Expanded globally with innovative export solutions.
about-page-section-journey-p-3: Recognized as a trusted partner in international markets.
products-page-title-p: Discover our full selection of export-ready fruits and vegetables available for immediate dispatch.
contact-page-h1: Ready to Connect? We're Here to Help.
contact-page-p: Our team is ready to help with product details, orders, or logistics support.
